Name: Daily Note Today

OpenOnStart.title: Auto-open Daily Note
OpenOnStart.text: Open Today's daily note automatically when the plugin is loaded

AutoOpenAfterSync.title: Auto create DN only after synchronization ðŸ§ªExperimental Features
AutoOpenAfterSync.text:
To solve the document conflict problem caused by synchronization + automatic opening of DN, try opening DN automatically after synchronization.
This feature is experimental and lacks sufficient testing, so please use it at your discretion.
Practical tests shown it not very useful, not recommended

DefaultNotebook.title: Default Notebook ID
DefaultNotebook.text: The notebook where the daily note is created by default, use the first notebook if blank

DisableAutoCreateOnMobile.title: Disable Auto Create Diary On Mobile
DisableAutoCreateOnMobile.text: This feature is mainly to avoid the problem of inconvenient handling when generating conflict diaries in mobile; if this option is turned on, "Open Today's Diary Automatically" will not work on mobile.

NotebookBlacklist.title: Notebook Blacklist
NotebookBlacklist.text: Notebook in the blacklist will not be shown in the dropdown menu. Default notebook can not be in the blacklist

update.title: Update Status
update.text: Update the status of the notebook when the notebook configuration changes

NotebookSort.title: Notebook Sorting Scheme
NotebookSort.text: 1. Same what document tree shows 2. Same the order defined in custom sorting mode

EnableMove.title: Enable "Move Block" in menu
EnableMove.text: When enabled, the "Move Block" item will be added to the menu after clicking on the block icon

EnableReserve.title: Enable "Reserve Block" in menu
EnableReserve.text: When enabled, the "Reserve Block" item will be added to the menu after clicking on the block icon

EnableResvDock.title: Enable "Show reservations" in dock menu
EnableResvDock.text: When enabled, the "Show reservations" pannel will be added to the dock menu at the right bottom side of the dock bar

ExpandGutterMenu.title: Expand all block menu items
ExpandGutterMenu.text: When enabled, the plugin's block menu items are expanded to appear as a separate secondary menu under the plugin menu

PopupReserveDialog.title: Popup Confirmation Window When Reserving a Block
PopupReserveDialog.text: Automatically displays a confirmation window when reserving a block to ensure the date is correct.

ResvEmbedAt.title: Insert reservations at
ResvEmbedAt.text: Insert reservations at top or bottom of today's daily note

RetvType.title: Insert reservations as
RetvType.text: Target block's type for reservations, could be embed block, link, or reference

SetPastDailyNoteAttr.title: Add document attribute to past daily notes
SetPastDailyNoteAttr.text:
âœ¨ Adding the custom-dailynote attribute to past daily notes for compatibility with SiYuan versions prior to 2.11.1.
If you don't understand what this button is for, it is recommended that you press it, and it won't bring you any extra trouble!
Note: Clicking this button once is enough.

HighlightResv.title: Highlight reservation icon
HighlightResv.text: Highlight reservation icon in dock bar when there is a reservation on the day

AutoHandleDuplicate.title: Auto-handle duplicates
AutoHandleDuplicate.text: Automatically handel with duplicate daily notes while detected, without popup dialog

AutoHandleDuplicateMethod.title: Auto-handle duplicates' method
AutoHandleDuplicateMethod.text: When detected duplicate daily notes, how to handle with them

TrashBinDocContent:
- This is the trash document for your daily notes, created by the 'Daily Note Today' plugin.
- You are seeing this document because you have set the 'Auto-handle duplicates' method' option in the plugin settings to 'Move to Trash'.
- All the documents under this document are the daily notes that were detected as duplicates by the 'Daily Note Today' plugin.
- If you feel they are not needed, you can delete all the duplicate documents.
- If you find this trash document bothersome, you can also delete it, and the plugin will recreate it when needed.
InvalidDefaultNotebook:
Sorry, but the plugin can not find a notebook that corresponds to this ID; perhaps it is an illegitimate ID, or the corresponding notebook has been closed by yourself.

We suggest that you double-check the plugin's settings.

MoveMenu.NotLi: Only support moving entrie list, instead of signle list item!
MoveMenu.VerIssue: Current version dose not support "Move Blocks" function (â‰¥ 2.8.8))

ReserveMenu.name: Reserve this block
ReserveMenu.Title: Reserve this block to
ReserveMenu.Date404: No date time found for reserving!
ReserveMenu.DatePast: Can not reserve for past time!

Msg.Resv404:
Ooops!??

It should have been reservation blocks here, but the blocks are not found

Maybe they were deleted or the notebook is closed

part1: Conflict files are listed below, the last line, indicated in bold, represents the earliest dailynote and will be treated as the main dailynote for auto-handeling
| Document ID | Title | Created | Updated | Notebook |
part2: You may have created a daily note on another device before and then created a daily note on this device, resulting in a synchronization conflict.
Please merge and delete redundant diaries manually: Open today's daily note, locate the daily note document, and the conflicting document will be nearby.
Auto-handeling method, please refer to the plugin documentation for details.
part3: We found that in addition to the dailynote document conflict, the parent document at the upper level seems to be in conflict as well, the "Auto Handler" cannot handle this complexity of merging document trees.
You can still to use the "Auto Handler" feature, while it is recommended that you manually deal with duplicate parent documents after auto-handling.
ConflictDiary.fail: Merge fail due to unknown reason, please merge them manually
